Monitor for grain maturity.The grain maturity can be judged by pressing the grain between thumb and index finger.At this stage material inside the grain is solid and hard and does not yield to pressure and also formation of small black layer in the hiler region of the seed.
Harvested earheads may be shifted to safer place
